mapper.insert:
select reservation_seq.nextval from dual
insert into reservation(rtnum,snum,userid,rtstartdate,rtstart,rtend,rtnumber,totalprice,rtstatus,rdate) values(#{rtnum},#{snum},#{userid},#{rtstartdate},#{rtstart},#{rtend},#{rtnumber},#{totalprice},0,sysdate)
mapper.update: update mem_info set point=(point-#{totalprice}) where userid=#{userid} and point>#{totalprice}
mapper.select: select sum(totalprice) from reservation where userid=#{value}
select * from mem_space_res_view where userid=#{value} order by rtnum desc
mapper.update: update mem_info set point=(point+#{totalprice}) where userid=#{userid}
